Detailed Description

DiagramComponent represents graphically an IP-XACT component instance.

DiagramPort * DiagramComponent::addPort ( QPointF const &  pos  ) 

Adds a new, empty port to the component. This function creates automatically an empty bus interface to the component model.

Parameters:
[in] pos The position hint for the port.
Returns:
The newly created port.

void DiagramComponent::onAddPort ( DiagramPort *  port,
bool  right 
) [private]

Adds a port to the correct port stack.

Parameters:
[in] port The port to add.
[in] right If true, the port is added to the right port stack. If false, it is added to the left port stack.
